message.raw:
Fixed bug where custom right-click menu of analog spin widget would not show in PyQt.

This was because in PyQt, you need to hold onto a reference to the menu object, or else it is garbage collected. In PySide, you do not. Introduced reference to the QMenu held by Python, is released when the menu is hidden.
message.html:
Fixed bug where custom right-click menu of analog spin widget would not show in PyQt.

This was because in PyQt, you need to hold onto a reference to the menu object, or else it is garbage collected. In PySide, you do not. Introduced reference to the QMenu held by Python, is released when the menu is hidden.

message:

This was because in PyQt, you need to hold onto a reference to the menu object, or else it is garbage collected. In PySide, you do not. Introduced reference to the QMenu held by Python, is released when the menu is hidden.
